description: This file defines API endpoints for inference operations in a FastAPI application, including a placeholder for running inference on input data and streaming inference results.

methods.name: InferenceResponse run_inference( payload: InferenceRequest, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to initiate inference, returning a placeholder response with status and metadata.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] stream_inference( user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to stream inference results, currently a placeholder returning a simple status message.

ctags.name: run_inference
ctags.signature: ( payload: InferenceRequest, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )

ctags.name: stream_inference
ctags.signature: ( user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
